类 UID

  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class UID
extends java.lang.Object
    The UID Class used to create unique id, or sequence, random string
    作者:
    joe

      generate a digital string with the length.
      static long get​(java.lang.String key)  
      static long hash​(java.lang.String s)
      Hash (64bits) of string.
      static java.lang.String id​(long hash)
      convert the long data to a BASE32 string.
      static java.lang.String id​(java.lang.Object... ss)
      generate the unique id by the parameter
      if the parameter are same, the id will be same, the "id" is H32 of hash(64bit) of parameters.
      static long next​(java.lang.String key)
      increase and get the unique sequence number by key,
      the number=[cluster.code] + seq

      return string with the length

      generate a global random string.

      generate a random string with the length.

      Random.
      static int[] random​(java.lang.String code, int len)
      generate a firm random by code, no duplicated
      static java.lang.String uuid​()

      • next

        public static long next​(java.lang.String key)
        increase and get the unique sequence number by key,
        the number=[cluster.code] + seq
        参数:
        key - the key
        返回:
        long of the unique sequence

      • id

        public static java.lang.String id​(java.lang.Object... ss)
        generate the unique id by the parameter
        if the parameter are same, the id will be same, the "id" is H32 of hash(64bit) of parameters.
        参数:
        ss - the parameters
        返回:
        string

        public static java.lang.String uuid​()

        String

        返回:
        the long

        the string
